mapper.insert: insert into User(uId, uPw, reuPw, uName, uGender, uTel, uAddr) values (#{uId}, #{uPw}, #{reuPw}, #{uName}, #{uGender}, #{uTel}, #{uAddr})
mapper.update: update User set uId = #{uId}, uPw = #{uPw}, reuPw = #{uPw}, uName = #{uName}, uGender = #{uGender}, uTel = #{uTel}, uAddr = #{uAddr} where uId = #{uId}
